amendment.description: To authorize the National Security Agency to collect service charges for the certification or validation of information assurance products.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4499 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4499 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6350) To authorize the National Security Agency to collect service charges for the certification or validation of information assurance products.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4499 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4499 proposed by Senator Warner.
